fields.value: Staff of Homa, The Catch (R5), Dragon's Bane, Favonious Lance, Primordial Jade Winged-Spear

fields.name: Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Emblem of Severed Fate <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Energy Recharge +20%.
• Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

fields.name: Second Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
*Crimson Witch of Flames <:4x:957694032216215573>*
• Pyro DMG Bonus +15%.
• Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases 2-Piece Set effects by 50% for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

fields.name: Third Best Artifact Set:
fields.value:
